title: ISic001137. I.Sicily inscription 001137
body:
Facsimile Images

Βαλ[ερί]α [---]
ἡ τὸν βίο[ν εὐ-]
πρεπ[ῶ] β[ιώσα-]
σα [ἔ]ζη[σεν ἔτη number]

Apparatus criticus

Text according to Kaibel in IG ; Gualterus: ΒΑΛ.ΚΑ..
3: Gualterus: ΠΡΕΠΟΣΡ...
4: Gualterus: ΣΑΣΖησεν

English translation

Baleria, having passed her life well, lived (?) years...

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0318 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 3.5579 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
